Joe Biden: 'Remains to be seen' whether he'll attend DNC in person ...  may not be as robust a convention. It may be a social distancing thing. It may be smaller. I don't' know. I can't ordain what that's going to be, but I plan to campaign in Milwaukee." MILWAUKEE — Democratic National Convention organizers are preparing for the possibility presumptive Democratic nominee Joe Biden will not accept the nomination in-person at Fiserv Forum in Milwaukee. "Well, it all depends on what happens," Biden said in an interview with sister station WISN 12 News Wednesday. "I think it is possible, but it remains to be seen. I wish I had a crystal ball what it was likely to be." Advertisement Convention organizers are preparing for a number of contingencies, including the fact a number of Democratic ...
